text: Victor Cannella (1870–February 3, 1946) was an Italian piano and xylophone player. == Career == Cannella played the piano in the Max Fleischer cartoon "Mr. Bug goes to town", and in Baseball Bugs. Cannella also played the xylophone in "Figaro & Cleo." == Death == Cannella died of Poliomyelitis on February 3, 1946. == References == Category:1870 births Category:1946 deaths Category:Italian pianists
title: Victor Cannella
